question: Which {location} had the {stats} {col} level increased most compared to {month} 2020 from {month} 2019 ?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[main_data["Timestamp"].dt.month == {code_month}]
    data = data[(data["Timestamp"].dt.year == 2020) | (data["Timestamp"].dt.year == 2019)]
    data["year"] = data["Timestamp"].dt.year
    data = data.groupby(["{code_location}", "year"])["{code_col}"].{code_stats}.reset_index()
    data = data.pivot(index="{code_location}", columns="year", values="{code_col}")
    data["diff"] = data[2020] - data[2019]
    data = data.dropna(subset="diff")
    data = data.sort_values(by="diff")
    print(data.iloc[-1].name)


true_code()
